labels.analysis: The Oxylabs MCP server is primarily designed for web scraping and content retrieval from various web sources, specifically Google and Amazon. It offers specialized tools for scraping search results, product listings, and detailed product information. The server supports advanced features like geolocation, locale customization, pagination, and different output formats, making it highly versatile for data extraction tasks.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Browser Automation" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around automated scraping and retrieving content from websites. "Web Search & Research" is a secondary label since it includes specialized tools for scraping search results. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories sufficiently cover the server's functionality.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Oxylabs MCP
server_info_crawled.author: @oxylabs/oxylabs-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Fetch and process content from specified URLs using the Oxylabs Web Scraper API.

tools.name: universal_scraper
tools.description: Deploy Server Oxylabs MCP @oxylabs/oxylabs-mcp Try in Playground universal_scraper

tools.name: google_search_scraper
tools.description: Scrape Google Search results. Supports content parsing, different user agent types, pagination, domain, geolocation, locale parameters and different output formats.

tools.name: amazon_search_scraper
tools.description: Scrape Amazon search results. Supports content parsing, different user agent types, pagination, domain, geolocation, locale parameters and different output formats. Supports Amazon specific parameters such as category id, merchant id, currency.

tools.name: amazon_product_scraper
tools.description: Scrape Amazon products. Supports content parsing, different user agent types, domain, geolocation, locale parameters and different output formats. Supports Amazon specific parameters such as currency and getting more accurate pricing data with auto select variant.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@oxylabs/oxylabs-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
